title: Make videos and slideshows with this $9 app
content:
A lot of video editing software takes forever to render, even if you only made little changes. And when it’s not the loading times, you’re dealing with bloated toolbars that are stuffed with features you won’t use unless you’re making a feature film complete. For simple video editing, you want MacX Video Converter Pro: Lifetime License, and during Black Friday, you can find it here for $8.99 (Reg. $59.99) with code BFSAVE40. 

MacX Video Converter Pro lets you make quick edits, convert formats, record your screen, or create a slideshow. MacX can convert videos to 420 different formats and devices without compromising the quality of the video. If you want to record your own videos, you can capture your screen or upload pictures and create a photo slideshow.
